entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `IDE0059` is not fired for property pattern assignment #66573
  • Introduce parameter should not be offered for literal values in attribute argument lists #66572
  • CultureInfo.CurrentCulture API banned in Analyzers but alternative API is inaccessible #66566
  • Correctly handle constructed types in parameterless ctor determination #66564
    Backlog

Closed

  • Whitespace normalization not ideal for immediate assignment to properties #42336
  • "abstract void Main()" compiles successfully #66516
    17.6
  • False negative for IDE0060 (parameter not used) when combining local functions and lambdas #66391
    Backlog
  • Assertion in nullable walker: "Did not find BoundCall in the map." #65053
    17.6
  • CA1707 applies to method names #66574
  • Missing completion for raw string after typing `$$"""` #66538
    Backlog
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits `ref`, `readonly`, `new` keywords for return types. #66376
    17.6
  • Possible to detect "external" global using aliases in analyzer? #66517
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits `in`, `out` keywords for generic types #66377
    17.6
  • Assertion in nullable walker (some nodes were not analyzed) #65056
    17.6
  • Nullable enums in parameter value shown as numbers in SymbolDisplay #66514

PullRequests

Created

  • Change the version number to preview 6 #66580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #66578
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Introduce parameter - don't offer for arguments or attribute arguments #66577
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Prefer list-pattern for length-only counterexamples (#66541)" #66576
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid unnecessary parsing in brace-completion #66575
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Project.HasSuccessfullyLoadedAsync logic #66569
    Area-IDE
  • Report when MethodImplOptions.Synchronized is used on async lambda #66568
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable static restore in more locations #66567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move compiler from netcoreapp3.1 to net6.0 #66565
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reduce delegate allocations in LanguageParser #66551
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Disregard static abstract methods as entrypoint candidates #66525
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Complete interpolated raw string when more than one dollar sign #66554
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add an API for the parsed command line back from an OptionsProcessor #66546
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update capabilities for streaming references #66562
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66549
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make SymbolDisplay show nullable enum values as enums #66528
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • LocalRewriter.DecisionDagRewriter - Remove redundant field #66539
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66581
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Introduce parser helper for parsing separated syntax lists. #66552
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline diagnostics - integration tests #66563
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow extract method in when statement #66165
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
